column4: im trying to drag and drop a folder from the desktop into my usb flash drive and im getting "error while copying. the folder "boot" cannot be copied because  you do not have permissions to create it in the destination."
can someone give me maybe the exact line for the terminal i'd need to write
so thats why i dont have permissions
can someone help me, im going crazy over this, can anyone devote some time to me in private chat
I suggest you call a local hotline if you need help on this
i moved the folder to home/ubuntu now i get this "cp: omitting directory '/home/ubuntu/boot'
cp doesn't recursively copy directories by default
CP: cannoty create directory 'media/disk-2/': no such file or directory
